Item.sqlserver_body:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[innovator].[SECUREMESSAGE]')) IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [SECUREMESSAGE]) RAISERROR ('Cannot drop [SECUREMESSAGE] since records exist there', 16, 1) ELSE DROP TABLE [SECUREMESSAGE]
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[innovator].[SECUREMESSAGE]')) DROP VIEW [SECUREMESSAGE]
Item.name: VC_SecureMessage_Step04_Drop_Table
